column2: an A.M. Eatery////Stumptown coffee & espresso drinks were solid. BUT THE PANCAKE FLIGHT: 1 sweet potato
column4: 1 piece french toast. It doesn't even make sense how good they are. I could tell you they're incredible and very sweet but not too sweet and super indulgent but still lovely and you'd be like
column5: "not sure what you mean" so I encourage you to try them yourself.
